document_data.mainbody:
ragons bite was a mixed alcoholic beverage that was served in inns and taverns across the Realms during the 14 century DR, such as the Hidden Lady.
A typical dragons bite was made using pale translucent green mint wine, pepper brandy, cinnamon powder, and licorice root.
The resulting mixed drink was minty-cool, with a licorice aftertaste. Dragons bite was not sweet nor bitter. It ended with the "bite", hot spicy cinnamon burn at the back of the drinkers throat.
